skbeam.core.cdi.generate_random_phase_field¶

skbeam.core.cdi.generate_random_phase_field(diffracted_pattern)¶

Initiate random phase.

Parameters:
diffracted_patternarray

diffraction pattern from experiments

Returns:
sample_objarray

sample information with phase
